channel.title: Password-Manager on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Password-Manager on Arrans github.io

item.title: keeweb/keeweb
item.description: Free cross-platform password manager compatible with KeePass

item.title: keepassxreboot/keepassxc
item.description: KeePassXC is a cross-platform community-driven port of the Windows application “Keepass Password Safe”.

item.title: authpass/authpass
item.description: AuthPass - Password Manager based on Flutter for all platforms. Keepass 2.x (kdbx 3.x) compatible.

item.title: lanedirt/AliasVault
item.description: Privacy-first password manager with built-in email aliasing. Fully encrypted and self-hostable.

item.title: passbolt/passbolt_api
item.description: Passbolt Community Edition (CE) API. The JSON API for the open source password manager for teams!

item.title: android-password-store/Android-Password-Store
item.description: Android application compatible with ZX2C4’s Pass command line application

item.title: Evidlo/passhole
item.description: A secure hole for your passwords (KeePass CLI)

item.title: padloc/padloc
item.description: A modern, open source password manager for individuals and teams.
